TEXT.TITLE: QUAKER OATS <OAT> CANNOT ACCOUNT FOR DECLINE
TEXT.BODY: Quaker Oats Co said in response to a query that it knew of no corporate development to account for the decline in its stock, trading at 54-3/8, off 2-1/8. Reuter
